Golden age [i](If you cast an instant or sorcery spell, activated a nonmana ability, and attacked this turn, enter a renaissance for this game.)[/i]
{1}{R}: Mieng gains flying until end of turn.
Whenever Mieng attacks, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying that’s tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat unless you’re in a renaissance.
